isis.stitle: FRONT DRIVE AXLE WHEEL ENDS: FABCO SDA-12 - DISASSEMBLY - UNIVERSAL JOINT REMOVAL

svcproc.title: UNIVERSAL JOINT REMOVAL
svcproc.para: The universal joint may be disassembled without complete disassembly of outboard section or it may be removed after the spindle yoke or complete outboard is removed.

Remove eight capscrews that attach the cross and bearing assembly to drive yokes (refer to Figure 21). Remove the cross and bearing (refer to Figure 29). Remove the capscrews from the center of the drive yokes and remove the drive yokes. The outer drive yoke may require some prying before it comes off the outer axle shaft. The inner yoke and shaft should be removed from the axle and separated on the bench.
